about_the_game:
Build a Spacefaring Empire in this 4X turn-based strategy game.

Explore, expand, exploit, and exterminate in Uciana, a turn-based strategy game set in a procedurally generated galaxy. Each playthrough brings fresh challenges with new star systems, events, alien races, and the unknown waiting to be discovered.

Strategically manage your empire's resources to thrive. Balance research, farming, and production to grow your systems while adapting to the ever-changing galaxy. Will you fortify your systems with defenses, or expand aggressively by building fleets to conquer and protect your growing empire?

Engage in tactical, turn-based ship-to-ship combat. Customize each ship with weapons, defenses, and components tailored to your strategy. Victory depends on careful planning and adapting to your role as leader.

Features:
  • Procedurally generated galaxy maps and systems for unique experience each time.
  • Ship customization.
  • Tactical turn-based combat.
  • Steam Cloud Saves for seamless play across devices.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
